Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 EmprzAnastazia [1:37 AM]:  Watches Scourge a moment. Not sure what to think, 
do... or even fells. Feeling was something she didn't want. But...
"Scourge," she stated as she took 2 steps towards him. "You exist & function 
now. At current... that is all that matters. Eventually, we all can return to 
Cybertron. & the Decepticons can conquer Cybertron & the remainder of the 
galaxy once more." She smirked, in rememberance of the old days.  
 FoxManRoar1 [1:48 AM]:  Scourge stopped, he turned slowly. "You don't get it 
do you." "It was all over, in my time stream "we" are in peace, there is no 
war, Unicron was destroyed and the Black Plague was stopped... There was no 
longer a need for factions, and I ruled over them all, I Killed Starscream 
for the murder of soundwave, and I fought ShockWave to the death, and I ruled 
over them all with an iron fist!" No war, no crime, no factions, we stand 
together...." 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:51 AM]:  She watched him for a time as he spoke. 
"That was your supposed time. Where ever you came from." 
Pausing, she wasn't sure whatelse to say next.  
 EmprzAnastazia [1:52 AM]:  "It's time for something new.. it's time for a 
change, Scourge. Forget where you came from." 
 FoxManRoar1 [1:53 AM]:  He looked at her, his expression crossing his face 
told she had said something wrong... "I cease to exist if my time does not 
occur!" 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:54 AM]:  "Your time or your Dimension?" more of a curious 
statement than a question. A slight smirk upon her face. 
 FoxManRoar1 [1:55 AM]:  He looked at her and slowly it set in... "I could be 
in another dimension?" 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:57 AM]:  "anything ... is possible, Scourge. Remember the 
Quints had portals to various dimensions. Who's to say that it's possible 
with you. Either way, your actions you do here, will still have a profound 
effect. & I mean to not let ANYTHING happen to Megatron. Period!" Pausing a 
moment. "Let alone those whom are Decepticon comrades." She smiled at him.
 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:57 AM]:  "Don't do anything so rash & quickly, Scourge." 
 EmprzAnastazia [1:58 AM]:  "I have served Megatron for many millenia. & I 
shall continue to do so."  
 FoxManRoar1 [1:58 AM]:  "Quints?" These boggled his mind... "What are 
quints?" 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:00 AM]:  She gazed at him, stiffening to her full height 
with pride. "For now.. what I can tell you... they are the enemies of all 
Transformers. NEVER trust them. No matter what they say."  
 EmprzAnastazia [2:01 AM]:  "They are beings either with 5 faces, of a single 
face... all float on an energy beam. But they are cruel & emotionless."  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:01 AM]:  He looked at her and smiled. "Are you with anyone at 
this time?" He realized how that sounded, "Errr I mean faction?" 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:06 AM]:  She smirked. "I am a Decepticon. Nothing more, 
nothing less. Though, I am allied with those who call themselves Predacons." 
 FoxManRoar1 [2:09 AM]:  Scourge's metallic mind began working. "Why, why not 
join with my team, I may not be of your time, But I am a Decepticon as well." 

 EmprzAnastazia [2:11 AM]:  "Time has no meaning for me. Just as long as you 
call yourself a Decepticon & are devoted to the cause, then I shall be 
pleased." She grinned.  
 EmprzAnastazia [2:12 AM]:  "But... understand this. I serve ONLY Megatron. I 
may appear to follow others, but... I will only serve Megatron."  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:14 AM]:  He smiled and raised his hands to his face and 
slowly with a hsss he made a slight movement, and lowering his hands revealed 
that he had removed the face plate, underneath his face resembled a younger 
bot, one who very well may be the son of the bot she cared so much for, "As 
my word as a decepticon i promise you a future that will be glorious!"  
 EmprzAnastazia [2:16 AM]:  She watched him, the face so similar, & she 
smiled. "Decepticon rule forever," she stated softly but with force.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:21 AM]:  He looked at her and smiled. "So what might I ask is 
a fellow "con" doing here?" 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:27 AM]:  "Long story.. unknown reason. I was on Cybertron, 
in stasis, then reformated into a pathetic techno organic form. Seems that 
when I went to Vector Sigma, by old form was refused to be returned to me. I 
had a run in with the Tripreds, escaped... landed here, met a coupel Maximals 
& then found the Predacons. However... nothing is what it was in the good ol' 
days." 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:27 AM]:  "There is a supposed Maximal who is supposed to 
be working on reconstructing my old form. I have a Predacon hunting him down. 
" 
 FoxManRoar1 [2:31 AM]:  Scourge looked at her and blinked. "Our C R Chambers 
must work differently, ours scans the beings around it inorder to create a 
form suited to it, the dinos became organic, as well as the others, but i was 
made... if our scanners scanned me as it worked on you then you would become 
a Mecha once again." 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:32 AM]:  "Noted & appreciated. Having a relation of sorts 
to organics is not something I care for."  
 EmprzAnastazia [2:33 AM]:  Despite her form was a transmetal mix/fuzor of a 
white tiger & a hawk.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:34 AM]:  "I know what you mean... i'll have to melt my 
trailer after letting the dino's ride in it." He looked her over and smiled. 
"But if I may add no femme in my time is not quite as well rounded." He 
chuckled. 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:35 AM]:  She looked up at him, with a slight smirk. "A .. 
minor adjustment."  
 EmprzAnastazia [2:36 AM]:  "Anothe rminor adjustment could be made as well," 
as she reached over to his hand & took the face mask. "Your faceplate is 
better without it."  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:37 AM]:  He looked at her and then the mask. "I keep it as a 
reminder, of where i came from, and where i went..." He smiled "You miss my 
father don't you." 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:40 AM]:  Her face somewhat went to a strange emotion. How 
could she answer that one. She remained silent, as she glanced back at the 
dormant form of Megatron. But, she thought about Hydras. It had been the 
first time she had thought about him since the beginning of this personal 
mission. So much has happened... 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:40 AM]:  But.. she answered, that even with Hydras, he was 
in stasis & damaged quite terribly... 
"Yes," she said with a soft voice.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:43 AM]:  He smiled and kneeling his chest opened and a panel 
slid open and a object slid out... "This is Megatron's last master plan 
unfinished, but remembered.." He lifted and handed to her, A matrix unit... 
"All its missing is a sparke to ignite it..." He smiled handing her the 
prurple and black object that looked like a clock work model of the planet 
saturn... 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:45 AM]:  She gazed at the object, as though it were 
Starscream given Leadership finally. 
Taking the object in her hands, she gazed at it. "& how is it possible to 
fill this?" She thought about the Autobot Matrix, that was from millions of 
years of built up wisdom.  
 FoxManRoar1 [2:48 AM]:  The souls of two great leaders... Father created it 
so when i fought Prime and died my spark would ignite it changing him into 
the decepticon leader he wished to be."   
 EmprzAnastazia [2:50 AM]:  She pondered that a moment. "Indeed. 
Unfortunately, you shall not get far here with that goal. Unless you face 
Rodimus Prime. However, I doubt that Hydras would allow you to have that 
pleasure." 
 FoxManRoar1 [2:53 AM]:  He smiled and shook his head and as he reached out 
the Matrix began to glow and hummm a small wave of energy began spreading up 
Maxi's arms...  they looked like her old arms but were different in some way 
he slid his hand away and smiled. "I can ignite it for a short time with out 
dying." "But it is not a good idea to stress it." He looked at the matrix and 
smiled. "You may keep it with you if you wish. 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:59 AM]:  She felt the energy pulse through her, nothing 
that was painful, just energizing. It was like Energon. 
She looked up at him, watching him a moment. Not sure what to do or say. Then 
nodding, "Thank you," 
But curiousity struck her again. "You said you can only ignite it for a short 
time... does that happen often when you touch it like that? Or was this the 
first time?" Observing the device. 
 FoxManRoar1 [3:02 AM]:  "I beleive it feeds off me when I carry it within my 
frame." "Like a reverse battery, and when i concentrate I can awaken it..." 
 EmprzAnastazia [3:04 AM]:  "I see," her curiousity was aroused. A Decepticon 
Matrix. The possibilities was just too good to be true. 
She smiled at him, with a wicked little glimmer in her crimson optics.

(Ooc in de books megatron did create a decepticon matrix.)
